description:
A space animation created with the new version of Blender 4.1.

Workflow
- Creation of the moon on Blender 4.1
- Rendering with Cycles (AgX) - 24 fps - 2.39:1 (3840.1608px)
- Compositing and post-production with DaVinci Resolve 18

Software
- Blender
- DaVinci Resolve

PC configuration
- 16 Go DDR5
- Intel Core I7-12700H
- NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050 Laptop GPU
